description: I. Letter dated 10/07/2009 from Stephen Rimmer (Director General, Crime and Policing Group) to John Yates (Assistant Commissioner, Metropolitan Police Specialist Operations) regarding phone tapping by News International journalists. 2 p. II. Letter dated 10/07/2009 from John Yates (Assistant Commissioner, Metropolitan Police Specialist Operations) to Stephen Rimmer (Director General, Crime and Policing Group) regarding phone tapping. 2 p. III. Statement by Assistant Commissioner John Yates. 9 July 2009. 2 p.
